scripts.synth:ui: CDK_STACK_NAME_SUFFIX=$npm_config_stack_name_suffix CDK_STACK_ENV=$npm_config_env AWS_PROFILE=samuelli-$npm_config_env cdk synth --app='npx ts-node --project src/infrastructure/tsconfig.json src/infrastructure/main.ts'
scripts.deploy:ui: npm run build-infra && CDK_STACK_NAME_SUFFIX=$npm_config_stack_name_suffix CDK_STACK_ENV=$npm_config_env AWS_PROFILE=samuelli-$npm_config_env cdk deploy --app='npx ts-node --project src/infrastructure/tsconfig.json src/infrastructure/main.ts'
scripts.destroy:ui: npm run build-infra && CDK_STACK_NAME_SUFFIX=$npm_config_stack_name_suffix CDK_STACK_ENV=$npm_config_env AWS_PROFILE=samuelli-$npm_config_env cdk destroy --app='npx ts-node --project src/infrastructure/tsconfig.json src/infrastructure/main.ts'
scripts.diff:ui: npm run build-infra && CDK_STACK_NAME_SUFFIX=$npm_config_stack_name_suffix CDK_STACK_ENV=$npm_config_env AWS_PROFILE=samuelli-$npm_config_env cdk diff --app='npx ts-node --project src/infrastructure/tsconfig.json src/infrastructure/main.ts'
